reviews.review:
Vor ein par Monaten konnt ich dieses Spiel noch empfehlen aber jetzt leider nicht mehr.

Das Spiel ist von der Idee gut und macht auch mit Freunden sehr viel Spass. 

Allerdings ist es zur Zeit einfach unmöglich. Durch die letzten Updates ist das Spiel sowas von verbuggt, dass es nicht mal zu einem Spiel kommt. Allein eine Lobby zu finden ist schon Glücksache, dass das Spiel nicht abschmiert... und wenn das der Fall ist kann man nix mehr machen, es hängt sich einfach auf. Lösung? ja die gibt es = ALT+F4!!! Es ist einfach eine Frechheit. Mir hat das Spiel echt Spass gemacht, aber wenn das noch länger so ist ohne dass das gefixt wird, dann wirds deinstalliert!
COOLES GAME ICH MAG CAMPER ! <3
挺好玩的
还不错
Um jogo divertido, bom jogar com amigos para ser mais divertido (Existem varios bugs no jogo, mas é preciso acostumar para jogar sem se irritar)

Also alles in einem ist Dead by Daylight echt ein super Spiel.
Es macht mega Spaß es mit Freunden zu zocken, wäre da nicht das Problem eine Lobby zu finden. 
Man braucht wirklich halbe Ewigkeiten, um überhaupt eine Lobby zu finden, nur um dann wieder herausgeworfen zu werden.
Das Matchmaking ist auch eine reinste Katastrophe, so wie die Serververbindungen und die zahlreichen Bugs im Spiel.
Auch alleine Spielen geht kaum, da man auch wieder schwierig eine Lobby findet und dann, bei schlechter Verbindung vom Killer, gleich zu Beginn rausfliegt, Und das immer und immer wieder.
Ich hoffe darauf dass die Entwickler, das in den Griff bekommen, damit alle wieder ihren Spaß am Dead by Daylight spielen haben.

У каждой игры есть свои плюсы и минусы, и эта игра не исключение.Игра доставляет удовольствие, но когда за тобой бежить Охотник или Тень с бензопилой Хиллбилли то игра перестает нравиться.Все же каждый решает для себя, брать ее или же нет, но лично мое мнение-игра стоит тех денег и нервов которые были на нее потрачены.
现在为止还没开始玩一局，无限反作弊强制离线，真心无力吐槽
love it.thanks to create dbd :D
Игра мне очень понравилась, впечатлен игрой)  Всем рекомендую приобрести эту игру)
Intenta escapar del asesino en un mapa oscuro. Tendras que hacer generadores para poder abrir las puertas.Si eres asesino tendras que encontrar y colgar a los asesinos en los ganchos.

买BUG送游戏···

不过还是挺推荐这款游戏的！！！

Son 30 gün içerisinde çoğu kişi tarafından tavsiye edilmediğini farkettim ama yinede almaktan vazgeçmedim videolarını izledim ve anında kararımı verip 31 TL ye aldım gerçekten verdiğiniz parayı hakediyor ister katil ister survivor olun her türlü eğlenceli katilin işi biraz daha kolay tabi survivor olarak 5 jeneratör tamir etmeniz gerekiyor ( takım olarak) onun dışında korku oyunu sevenler hiç düşünmeden alsıın.
Gioco veramente interessante e coinvolgente, ma pieno di bug segnalati molto tempo fa.
good
就冲着杨永信，不能不给好评！
垃圾服务器，令人失望，光 进去就要等半个小时，排上人又要半个小时，更别说还有各种bug和猎空，除此之外我还想说的是............什么时候出杨永兴？？

Цель игры за выживших завести 5 генераторов ,не дать умереть товарищам, и в конце концов сбежать. Спасти своих друзей можно от кидания поддонов на голову маньяка до его ослепления фонарём. Цель маняька-принести в жертву всех выживших. Каждый маньяк обладает своей необычной силой. И выжившие и маньяки имеют свои уникальные навыки, ко торыми они могут поделиться со своими товарищами. Также есть система рангов. За одну игру можно получить до 2 капель (Соберешь 4 или более капель-поднимется ранг)
Плюсы игры: 
1)Непредсказуемость в каждом матче (Разные маньяки, тиммейты, расположение предметов на карте)
2)Хоррор в котором боятся нечего (кроме слитых капель)
3)Необычный ко-оп в котором от каждого зависит судьба каждого
Минусы:
1)Баги (не очень часто попадаются)
2)Коммьюнити (большая часть недоразвитые школьники, так что готовьтесь нырнуть в ведро с помоями)
3)Дисбаланс (с каждым обновлением не знаешь чьи права ущемят в этот раз)
4)Ужасная оптимизация (даже на моощнецом компе будет проседать до 20 фпс)
Solve bug perk decisive strike please.
Pretty good job so far.
Игра херня

Симулятор бега вокруг паллетов. 

Баги, лаги, фризы, телепорты. Уровень игры - альфа-тест, но никак не релиз. 
Через каждые 3 катки - зависание в меню с бесконечным ожиданием, выход только через alf+f4. Зашли в игру втроем с маньяком, а один выживший еще и сразу дисконнектился? Ниче страшного, с 5 генераторами должны справиться. Положил свой ультра фонарь с крутыми аддонами в сундук ради аптечки, чтоб подлечиться? Чао-пока, фонарь тебе не вернут, так как ты должен страдать. Перепрыгнул от маньяка через окно или лежащий паллет и собрался убегать - на хитулю!! 
Ты увидишь все, что представлял в своих самых страшных кошмарах: два маньяка в одной катке, маньяк сдвумя орудиями, низкоранговые игроки с 1 навыком против перворанговых. 

10 кошмаров на улице Вязова/10

Upd. После того, как онлайн упал, пользователи уронили рейтинги игры, а у разработчиков кончились запасы алкоголя, наркотиков и куртизанок, они смогли невозможное, выкатили патч, который решил большинство проблем в игре, прежде всего, технического характера. Максимум, что я встречаю - редкие подлагивания (возможно траблы с моим оператором) и такие же редкие подвисания при поборе команды (возможно виноват скатившийся онлайн). 

Из геймплея: добавили деда и 4 необходимых навыка для борьбы с кемперами-маньяками (да-да, наконец-то ведьмы сосо). Осталась проблема с фейскемперами, но разрабы, вроде, знают о проблемах. 

Однако баланс был снова перекошен. Теперь страдают рукожопые маньяки, привыкшие подсасывать у крюков. Достаточно 4 выживших со слухом, умеющих пользоваться пробелом, и маньяк в обломе. 

Игру пока советую покупать очень острожно. Возможно крокодильи слезы маньяков будут услышаны, и разрабы выкатят очередной патч, который на этот раз вызовет бугурт и жопаболь у выживших.

upd2: как и думал, плач манов был услышан и разрабы поэтапно вытащили сразу два кошмара для рандомных выживающих - Кожаное Лицо aka прокаченный Билясик, и Крюгера aka апнутый до безумия Коля-Колоколя. Крюгер кста довольно прикольный, хотя анальный зуд вызывал почти неделю у 20 рангов, да такой, что уже на вторую неделю его существования разрабы быстро накатали план нерфа. Главное фишка его в том, что за него нереально кемпить (поэтому топ-про-маны уже не играют за него) и можно тоннами вывозить очки альтруизма, играя за выжившего. Нерфить его нужно было аккуратно (например просто уменьшить радиус ВХ, или увеличить расстояние, с которого он начинает работать), ибо уже сейчас, проиграв два дня, я его ни разу не встретил. 

Настройка баланса плач манов-плач выживающих продолжается... запасаемся льдом, огнетушителями и мазями
bug一直有但不可否认这款游戏的魅力。

A lot of cheaters playing for like 2 weeks and developers who know about the problem do nothing about it. So killers freely use survivors perks which allow to see survivors across the map.

Игра за маньяка: 
-убил всех - фу, читак, крыса, репорт тебе 
-выжил хотя бы один - фу, дно, репорт тебе 
Игра за выживших: 
-починил все геники
-открыл все ворота
-побежал спасать товарища
-спас, тебя поймали, вся команда уходит через открытые тобой ворота, оставляя тебя умирать на крюке 
-ты сраное дно, на тебе 5000 опыта и гони сюда полоску ранга

I love this game. Both killer side and survivor side. 
Okay, the Devs still got some work to do, the game isn't perfect. It can be hard to join sometimes, but I usually get into a lobby pretty fast (after i restarted the game a couple of times - i have to add) But i think the Devs are working hard to fix the problems and they come up with new content on a regular basis, which is awesome. New killers, New maps, New Survivors etc.
Then there are two things the Devs really cant do much about:
1. Camping killers, Basically it's the killers job to get a survivor on a hook and then the survivor will slowly die, but you can be saved by your fellow survivors (and they generally try to save you) UNLESS the killer will just stand right infront of you and wait till you pass 'to the other side'. Or they partol the area way to close to the hook (mostly done by newer killers i think).
2. When you're a killer and you're actually any good, you're gonna get a sh*tload of hate, salt, rage, toxic coming your way. But I guess you need to deal with that or, the best thing in my opinion, just ignore it and have fun hunting.
That said, I think the game is lots of fun and, especially when you're new, it will get your heart pumping. Both as killer and survivor.

[5-17-18]
I'll leave the original review below if nothing else than for comparison. Dead By Daylight has been my go-to game for the past 2 years. With the variety of killers and playstyles, it's overly addicting. With the constant updates and consistent addition to the killer roster and Perks list, no longer is it Glitch by Daylight. The bugs are mostly fixed, loading times have stabilized, the game works as it is intended to, and with more and more killers each "Chapter."

You can already see how to play in other reviews so  to put it simply it is an adrenaline rush that I can't get enough of. And if you play with some friends over Discord, it gets even better.

Hell I'm probably going to go play it again now.

[1-7-17]
The gameplay is great, but get ready for load screens. Sometimes when you attempt to "Join a Lobby," the game leaves you in a Loading Loop for minutes on end. I've left it running for around 15 minutes before and still be loading, though tbf it generally exits to the main menu after awhile. While there are buttons for "Back [esc]" left in the top left corner for use in just such a time, they prove to be utterly futile and redundant as no matter how many times I press [esc] or the "Back" text, it does nothing more than make an input sound to show that yes, it sees I'm attempting to use that feature but no, it isn't working. 
I've resorted to getting out the Task Manager just to close the game so that i can turn it back on, go through the menu and "Join a Lobby" once again. This generally happens 2-3 times before I actually get connected, but once I'm connected it usually connects fine for a few rounds before I have to close it out again.

TLDR: Great game when it works, but you'll prolly have to close it a few times before it actually connects you to a game. The caveat is that it's still worth it.

- El host es el asesino por ende si el asesino tiene un Internet de mierda, tu experiencia de juego tambien va a ser de mierda.
- Mucho abuso de la jugabilidad del juego, asesinos que se quedan parados enfrente de su victima hasta que se mueran arruinando la experiencia de juego y sin forma alguna de evitarlo.

El juego tiene potencial, es algo que nuevo, exige mucha cooperacion en equipo pero en un juego donde cada segundo, cada golpe y cada esquive/reaccion determina si seguis jugando o no, no pueden existir este tipo de fallas... Mucho por mejorar

Like a game of chess, each game starts pretty much the same but ends in countless different ways. My biggest issue with this game is the community has a bit of a entitlement issue. Survivors are entitled to live, killers are entitled to kill, and whether we win or lose, there's something to complain about. Not the entire community of course, but there is far too much hate and negativity. Past that, the game is fantastic, and the developers seem to listen to the playerbase for feedback and update. I only wish there would be a bit more consistent communication from developers regarding issues such as hackers, balance, and future planning, but I understand why transparency may not always be feasible.

Overall, the game is a bit pricey, especially with all the DLC's, but the amount of content and entertainment time I receive from these DLC's and the game itself is worth it to me. Even without the DLC's, the game has plenty to explore and love.

Survivor nerfs left and right. Map designs/redesigns to favor killers. poorly coded. new bugs every patch. new patches break matching usually. no new game modes have been added...ever. desync. they release dlc characters left and right instead of focusing on core gameplay or bug fixes. they release alot of cosmetics every 2 weeks or so and 1 skin costs 10 dollars. you could spent hundreds on skins alone even though the entire game with all dlcs cost more than 100 dollars. they make promises they can't keep. its simply not fun anymore. if you're looking for a game where skill is involved in order for you to win, look elsewhere. poor map design etc cucks you no matter how well you play.

It does seem like it takes awhile for loading due to maybe less people playing ( when as killer) but the game is now playable/fun and I can now recommend it.

Started playing this game about two months ago and it has been a lot of fun. Since a recent patch in December/January however the game has become completely unplayable due to FPS issues. Have tried running the game on the lowest settings and disabling various settings such as V-Sync. I was previously able to play on ultra with no issues. now I can't even play on the lowest setting.

As much as I enjoy this game in the current unplayable state I can no longer reccomend this game until these issues are fixed.

Game has same response. I cannot reccomend this game until these issues of fps issues have been resolved.

If I can play this game the day it comes out I should be able to continue playing after patches without suffering FPS issues.

A pretty good game but however has a lot of bugs that need to be fixed in order to be able to enjoy the game. Has a lot of good qualities especially when playing with multiplayer (Survive With Friends.) It is somewhat frustrating the way people take advantages of the glitches in this game. As a person who plays this regularly on a daily basis, it is even frustrating in my point of view. I enjoy the DLC packs that come out every once in a while but the bug fixes just need to be fixed. The quality is great along. Community is alright but not the best. Would recommend.
Always a great game if you love those tense little moments when you're running for your life. Matches are quick and it's always great fun outsmarting the baddie :)

Changing review to a non-recommend. The match-making system is completely broken, there are numerous bugs that have been in the game since launch, new updates have created numerous exploits, each update seems to nerf Killers, and the most recent Hag DLC gave everyone a new weakling killer no one plays (and includes a map I've seen multiple streamers call a "survivor's dream map").

But the most game-breaking addition to the game, however, was the devs adding matches where four survivors can 'play with friends' and use voice chat to coordinate across the map against the killer. This confers such a huge disadvantage against the Killer that the only current advice is "if you think it is a SWF (Surviving with friends) group, disconnect from the matchmaking lobby by unplugging your internet". Apparently the devs said the game was never designed for survivors to communicate in this way and it shows.

Also, if you think this game will maintain any of the atmosphere of horror, you'd be wrong - especially the endgame. Imagine being Michael Myers and carrying a stabbed survivor to a hook only to have the other three survivors forming a defensive line to block you until the survivor you are carrying breaks free. Scary right? Really gives the impression Michael is an unstoppable force of evil right? Now imagine the endgame where suvivors are so overpowered that they decide when to 'give' you hits on them as they escape the map. Captures the slasher-movie vibe right? Now imagine Killers who actually 'work' with survivors to farm points because they know they won't get legitimate kills but want to get something for their time. It's a joke at this point.

But don't take my word for it, watch any popular Twitch streamer play survivor and you'll see how ridiculous the game has become. Too bad too, it was better at launch than it is today.

Original review was from when the game released.
---This is basic 4 survivors versus 1 killer multiplayer. Survivors must hide from killer long enough to power up 5 generators so escape gates will open. Killer must hunt, cripple and then hang survivors from sacrificial hooks before they escape.

It's a fun PvP horror game for $20 (as of 08/29/16) and you'll get many hours of play out of it.

I tried to give it a chance and I got a couple of my friends the game, but I don't think I can deal with these bugs/exploits anymore. I might not have played as much as some people, but when you lose literally everything it kind of makes you hate this game. I sent in information and never recieved an email about anything. I think fixing bugs and exploits would be their first priority for this game instead of pushing new content out. 

My Claudette is level 0 for godsake, they are supposed to start at level 1. Level 0 doesn't even exist! It even has a level 30 bloodweb at level 0! I don't even know how that is supposed to work.

Update - 11 Jan 17 - Still. Absolutely. Nothing. This happened on 19 Dec 16. Almost a month.

Update 22 Dec 17 - I never updated this after I got my points back (20 Jan 17) but it has actually turned around now. I can connect to my friends and we can actually find games without waiting an hour.

Que tenga bugs, que tenga poca variedad de mecanicas, que te vendan dcl de personajes... puedo perdonar muchas cosas, pero que entre 1 de cada 10 partidas que intento jugar es de locos,  me dice que no pude unirme, aveces le doi atras lo vuelvo a intentar... hasta que se queda cargando interminablemente.

Dejar de hacer dcl y arreglar el juego machotes, almenos que se pueda entrar en partida.

Aunque es verdad que esto sucede menos entrando en jugar con amigos y entrar solo, es absurdo que tengas que hacer esto y no arreglen el match normal, es un juego que ofrece algo unico, una tension que otros no ofrecen y en multijugador, espero que cuiden mas los detalles.

Good game love the deception and some tricks you learn as the killer or survivor. Extremely fun with friends. Micheal Myers is by far the scariest to play against. BUT FOR FUCK SAKE GET RID OF FREDDY!!! That dude is a little OP
There isnt another game out there that puts me on the edge of my seat like this. 100% a must buy.

DONT BUY THIS GAME. Out of the 12 hours i have spent "playing" this game about 1 or 2 of those hours has been actual gameplay while the rest was waiting in lobby trying to find a game or restarting the game because the lobby glitched out. If i was ever able to play the game the matches were super short because either the killer camped a survivor and we were able to fire up the generators extremely quickly or the survivors were randomly disconnected for no reason at all. The developers do not know what they are doing and need to take this game back to beta or alpha, it is THAT bad. The only people who will actually reccomend you this game are the people who had early access back in the beginning of the year and have all the perks for the survivors/killers and the game is MUCH easier when you have perks on either side. I repeat DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. The 1 game that you get every hour is not worth the restarts and the waiting.

Gioco con potenziale enorme ma con sviluppatori che non sanno fare il proprio lavoro.
Killer che ti hittano con hitbox invisibili, lag e chi piu' ne metta. Questo perchè non vengono aggiunti server dedicati. 
Ogni patch che viene aggiunta è garantito al 100% che sia un nerf al survivor (non ricordo l'ultima volta che sia stato buffato).
Vogliamo parlare dell'evento di Halloween? Una cagata pazzesca. È ovviamente un'altro nerf ai survivors non ufficiale, dato che per raccogliere il nettare si è costretti a girovagare come dei mentecatti perdendo tempo e togliendo la prorità ai generatori. Nell'evento di Halloween, invece, i killer NON subiscono una variazione di gameplay importante come per i survivors! Insomma, di male in peggio.

I wish I could recommend it because on paper its a dream come true but in practice its broken in many ways.  The devs have it hard.  In low tier killers are broken but in high tier they are too weak.  The number of killers and their diversity also make it hard to balance because there is no "expected" way to play survivors.  Certain strategies are not viable vs certain killers... hope everyone has the right perks for their random encounters :D

Pro's
- fun with conditions
- teamwork and coordination essential
- challenging
- relatively short games
- strategies (more and more impossible to figure out as more killers and perks are released.
- unpredicability, every game will be very different

Con's
- less and less of a horror game
- killers are over powered if they have ever played where's waldo
- being the first person killed
- HUGE, STEEP learning curve for survivors (If you start this game expect to die the first 20-30 games you play often within a few minutes of play.  You will constantly make mistakes that will get you killed early which will feed your frustration as you lose over and over with little feedback on what you're doing wrong but if you get gud then you will survive low tear killers without being seen)
- killers who decide to camp (clarification this only sucks for the person being camped, because essentially they don't get to play that game, or if you have a daily challenge that requires you to save or heal people.  Technically this is the best thing that can happen for survivors as a whole, if only it was fun to abandon your friends...)
- Survivors killing every hook while you are too low level to have perks that help you deal with a lack of hooks (This has been taken to the opposite extreme sabo perk is all but useless now due to an increased number of hooks on smaller maps, instead of giving a more balanced solution.)
- painful daily challenges that somtimes are literally impossible unless you have a high level killer/have once off items... hope you pull it off this match
- LAG, annoying for killer, game breaking for survivors.  If you have lag issues DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME FOR EVERYONE'S SAKE.
- Salty players who can't take a hit for the team and struggle while everyone gets generators.
- The realization that if you aren't feeling like a duche while playing it you willl probably lose.

To clarify I play both survivor and killer.  4/5 games as the killer I get 4 executes. I've only completely lost 1 game and in most games (as survivor or killer) only 1 survivor gets out alive from my experience if any do.

Why I just can't recommend the game and its inherent problems that can't be fixed.
 I've come and gone from this game many times but recently I've been thinking about the game and why I don't like it from a non-player view.  There are several issues with this game but the biggest struggle with this game, in my oppinion, is the learning curves.  The issue arrises with the fact that the survivor learning curve is very steep for several reasons.  A great survivor will never been seen making the game annoying and bad for killers so survivors need to constantly be nerfed to avoid this which makes new survivors struggle more and more.  Killers need to be Very strong to deal with high level survivors.  Do you see the vicious cycle?

Now lets talk about "Camping" this ruins "A" survivors game.  It essentially says you don't get to play.  Now as soon as the survivors know the killer is a camper the good strategy is to let them die and finish 3+ gens while he is on the hook.  Having said that you feel like a dush and its not fun.  Devs know this and they want everyone to have fun so they have to nerf this but you can't... not really anyway the only solution is to make it a bad strategy but doing so gives the survivors buffs for the most part.  This is why survivors can complete gens quickly add the fact that every minute the game lasts it becomes easier for killers, less palets to go around.

The devs of this game have it really really hard because you can't balance for high level and low level game play, like any other game, but for this game the difference between these 2 types of players is so high that the game just can't be balanced until it becomes more homogenous.  Hopefully the new tutorial will help but that is asking a lot.  Also I know you need to release new content to keep people interested but maybe just add maps for the next bit while everything gets figured out.
Constantly freezes during the simplest things (finding lobby, load screen). Fun game but this game's code is actually dogshit.

Welcome to a game where you can enjoy the wonders of instant terror, where you are hopefully joined by three teamates (considering they don't disconnect instantly) who will help you through your trial as you attempt to escape the horrors of this accursed place (the worst being the dlc maps, which clearly favor the killer over the survivors).

Play as many characters, all with one thing in common, they don't want to die. Unless you're Dwight. He spends his time hanging around screaming in pain and dying within the first minute.

This game is quite honestly one of my favorite co-op experiences. The rush of being chased by one of the six available killers is amazing, and the joy of bamboozling said blind morons is even better.

Playing as a killer is a ton of fun, unless you camp like a piece of garbage and everyone let's you know how much they dislike you after the end of the game. But that's okay! Because they are all morons and they should know that it's easy to cheese camping noob killers. You litterally just take one hit AND THEN take your friend off the hook. I know. It's crazy. But it actually works.

The games are quick and filled with instant fun, but that's if you can actually get in a game you silly fool! Ha! You thought it was as easy as connecting and playing with games. But no. It's much more idiotic than that. Enjoy dying to the killers who just so conveniently host each game! Meaning you have the disadvantage within the first second of playing. It can get pretty ridiculous. Especially when people fire up their ancient Aztec routers to host these games.

All in all, it's one of my favorite games, it's a ton of fun to play with friends or without. Don't watch the popular youtubers play it because they're mostly noobs that are doing annoying roleplay crap. Watch someone that takes the game seriously. Like anybody except the popular youtubers. Anybody.
Connecting to games can take years if you count by the way you feel but once you're in a game its tons of fun. The survivor community is awesome. Everyone will risk their life trying to save you. It's great. A lot of killers are camping noobs and suck giant donkey hair balls. But most are top class killers and some will even take the time to faf about with you and wave good bye as you skip to my lou towards your escape.

Buy the game, don't bother with the dlc. Unless you really like the survivors and killers (the maps are trash).
Way too addicting

Great game, Got it when it first came out. It was abit hard for the survivors at that point, but as the game developed the survivors became more powerful. Still doesn't help much for the killers that consistently camp the hooks, but hey it makes all kinds to make a comunity. Eather way the new updates and dlc add new dinamics to the game makeing it harder for both killers and survivors, this is a welcomed change. I expect great things in the next dlc/updates. And to those aspired killers, dont bother camping. Even if you care about rank, you dont need that many sacrifices or any at all. I cant get rid of my rank, (13 btw) even when all survivors escape. Also pick up some headsets with surround sound, trust me it helps for both killer and survivor.
Je trochu poslední době zabugovaná ale je pořád pro mně nejlepší hra .

I paid for this game and I wish, that I did not.

1) It is not a first release, they have few DLC's already, but the game  is FULL WITH BUGS!  Some abiblities may cause your character (e.g. Nurse's Blink) to stuck into textures, and fall underground for eternity. Some actions do not work as they were supposed to be, instead of grabbing the victim, killer just hit it or hit already hooked victim, etc.

2) VERY UNSTABLE MATCHMAKING!!!
It is almost always "Failed to connect the game" , when you try to find a game. And it is not the worst. After few "Failed to connect the game" errors, the game simply crashes and stop reacting to anything, with a black screen of download. So you have to restart the game. 
Just for you know, if I want to play as a survivor I have to restart the game 3-7 times, to be able find a game!

3)VERY UNSTABLE CONNECTION!!!
Sometimes you are happy, that after few restarts you have finally found a game. So you wait, wait some more time and again some more time, luckily it is ready and your character is on a screen. And then, guess what? 
You appear ALONE on map. 1vs1 killer and victim. All other players "have disconnected".  
To ones, who do not know the game mechanics , you have to activate at least 2 generators in order to hatch (dark lock) appear (it is almost impossible to win or do something, because power of player roles are too unequal and it supposed to be 4 survivors instead of 1) . 
Sometimes it freezes, sometimes players disconnect right away. Eh!!!

I do reccomend you not to buy this game, cause dev's are intrested in making DLC's (green\cash\bucks\chips\dough\gravy\loot\pesos) instead of fixing goddamn problems.
Oh, I wish I had a chance to get my money back...
Do not make my mistake.
